quotes.quote: Unemployment is capitalism's way of getting you to plant a garden.

Unemployment diminishes people. Leisure enlarges them.

The cool thing about unemployment is every day is Saturday.
Employment frees man from the nightmare of unemployment, while it chains him to his employer’s dream.
